playerId.title: Enter your player ID
playerId.infoPlayerId: You can find your player ID in your
playerId.idNotMatch: This ID does not match any player

mail.title: Enter your e-mail
mail.dontWantMail: I don't want to receive a purchase confirmation

success.title: Thank you !
success.message: Your payment has been accepted and you are now VIP. You can find all the information about your VIP on your profile.

error.title: Oh no !
error.message: An unexpected error occurred. You may have been debited. Please contact an administrator if this is the case and you are not VIP.

shopPricing.title: Use your coins
shopPricing.p1: Your Armory Coins allow you to become VIP for a certain period of time and unlock skins. You must be VIP to use those skins.

modal.error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again and contact an administrator if the problem persists.
modal.success: Your purchase has been successfully completed. You must perform an in-game disconnect/reconnect to enjoy it.
modal.neverConnected: You have never logged on to the server. Please log in once before making a purchase
modal.notEnoughtAc: You don't have enough Armory Coins to buy this item

description.title: Become VIP
description.p1: To guarantee you the most pleasant gaming experience, we have invested in a high-performance server. But it comes at a cost, and we need you to help us finance the server.
description.p2: In return for your donation, you will unlock:
description.p3: Exceptional visuals for your vehicles and outfits
description.p4: A reserved slots so that you can always connect

availableSkins.title: Available skins
availableSkins.p1: Many skins are available as VIPs. These skins are designed for "strider" vehicles. However, they can also be worn on other vehicles or outfits. Some skins also have sirens.
availableSkins.p2: These skins are the ones available by default in the VIP.
availableSkins.p3: Skins representing the different divisions are also available. As a VIP, you will have access to skins representing your division and those of the lower divisions.
availableSkins.p4: It is possible to help us to finance the server by buying a personalized skin. This skin will be custom made according to your requests.
availableSkins.sirenAvailable: Sirens are available for this skin.
availableSkins.sirenNotAvailable: Sirens are not available for this skin.

freeDonation.title: Free donation
freeDonation.p1: You can donate the amount of your wish.
freeDonation.p2: This donation does not offer any In-Game advantage, but allows us to continue to develop and to offer you a better gaming experience.

customSkin.title: Custom skin
customSkin.p1: It is possible to order a personalized and individual skin. This skin will be made to measure according to your requests. It is also possible to provide us with the skin you want. The price is â‚¬25,00.
customSkin.p2: Please contact a founder for more details on order and payment terms.
